screenshots.caption: Bones player in action, with expanded playlist

name: Bones Music Player
short_description:
Tired of the boring looks of just about every music player? Don't want to install XBMC to get an awesome interface for playing music? Then Bones Player is the right program for you. 
It has a fully custom-made interface that is designed to be really easy to work with, and it is all accelerated by your graphics card. With the final version you will be able to fine tune your music collection exactly how you want it. For now, you can only play music with it.
summary: Bones player is a next-gen music organizer and player.
